content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 (7 ounce) can pressurized whipped cream" )

content.text: 0) Spread 1/4 cup of chocolate hazelnut onto each crepe.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Spread"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "1/4 cup of chocolate hazelnut"@10:39 / FOOD )
		:gol ( ing-1 "each crepe"@45:55 / FOOD )
		:_result ( crepe-with-hazelnut )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Arrange 1 sliced banana down the center of each one.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
   :inform ( ac-1-0 "Arrange"@3:10 / AC
      :ppt ( ing-2 "1 sliced banana"@11:26 / FOOD )
      :gol ( "the center of each one"@32:54 / FOOD )
	:_result crepe-with-banana
   )
)

content.text: 2) Roll up, and place in a warm skillet over medium heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Roll up"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( crepe-with-banana / FOOD )
		:_result ( crepe-roll )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "place"@16:21 / AC
		:ppt ( crepe-roll / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "a warm skillet"@25:39 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "medium heat"@45:56 / TEMPERATURE )
		:_result ( crepe-on-skillet )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Let them warm up for about 90 seconds.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "warm up"@12:19 / AC
		:ppt ( "them"@7:11 / PRONOUN )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "90 seconds"@30:40 / DUR )
		:_result ( warmed-crepe )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Transfer to plates, and serve topped with whipped cream.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Transfer"@3:11 / AC
		:gol ( tool-4-0 "plates"@15:21 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( warmed-crepes / FOOD )
		:_result ( crepe-on-plates )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "serve"@27:32 / AC
		:ppt ( crepe-on-plates / FOOD )
		:todo ( "topped with whipped cream"@-1:-1 / COMPLEMENT )
		:_result ( FINAL_PRODUCT )
	)
)
